attributes.action: Explain to the nation why rail travel costs more than road travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please explain how travel by rail costs more than road travel?

A return ticket to a destination 20 miles from my home costs £17.50 at peak times
Yet to drive the 40 mile round trip would cost me £4

How does the rail network defy economies of scale?
Why are the travelling public being ripped off?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
